section.p: You are sage enough to recognise goblin magic when you see it; the image of the girl is a simple illusion often used by goblins and trolls to ensnare their prey.

You eyes search the darkness for a hidden assailant. Sure enough, worming its way up a narrow gully towards you is a snaggle-jawed troll. You put your shoulder to a nearby boulder and push, sending a small avalanche down the cleft at the aghast creature. It is dislodged and buried.
You hurry on before it gets free. Tick the codeword Earth and .
